title: David Schmidtz on Rawls, Nozick, and Justice
description: David Schmidtz of the University of Arizona talks with EconTalk host Russ Roberts about the work of John Rawls and Robert Nozick. The conversation covers the basic ideas of Rawls and Nozick on inequality and justice and the appropriate role of the state in taxation and property rights.
author: webmaster@econlib.org (EconTalk: Russ Roberts)
